name: Spawntaneous Radiation
description:
Equip either your blaster to damage the alien spiders or the diffuser to stop the bombs from exploding. Click on the enemies with the blaster to damage them, or the diffuser to defuse a bomb. 

Controls- Left click with mouse. 

This game was supposed to be my first game jam game, but due to unforeseen problems was delayed until slightly after submissions were closed. :( 

It was a 3 day jam and the theme was radiation, which inspired the bombs. The limitation was One-Handed controls, which is why the controls are very simple.

I will be updating the game to fix bugs and polish it when I get the chance and maybe even adding new content pog. 

Any Feedback is appreciated. :)
